"I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the 


             -215- 

Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty. I, John, who also am your brother, and companion in tribulation, and in the kingdom and patience of Jesus Christ [we need to cultivate Christlike patience], was in the isle that is called Patmos." Why was he there? "For the word of God, and for the testimony of Jesus Christ."
